articles.title: KKR, Hero to pump $450 million into Hero Future Energies, raise valuation to over $1 billion - The Economic Times
articles.description: HFE's valuation will cross $1 billion with KKR's investment. In November 2019, Abu Dhabi Future Energy Co. (Masdar) picked up a 20% stake in HFE for $150 million, valuing the New Delhi-based company at $750 million
articles.content: US private equity firm KKR and the Hero Group will invest $450 million in Hero Future Energies (HFE), they said on Tuesday. The investment will help HFE, the Hero Groups renewable energy arm, expand … [+2235 chars]
